column5: Yes but when you mix a nut with a gun you see what you get, just way too easy for the nuts to get the guns!!! Remember the Florida car dealer that was offering a AK47 with a vehicle purchase and that is just nuts as you say!!  Nice too know that perhaps a neighbor or two have a AK47 at their fingertips!!!
It had 300 views when I first looked and now it has 300,000
Sorry guys.. but the lunatic fringe doesn't stop at the border. It's not like we haven't had our own similar nut jobs up here..
Folks love this kind of stuff. I don't think we need this on our board. Good night children.

Massive shooting in Arizona... including a Congress Women shot point blank... as well as a Judge...  Last I saw 17 shot 6 are dead...  Watching a live news conference on the CNN website...  I hope for the families of this tragedy that those wounded recover from their injuries.  G
Crazy!!

anybody remember this in september? http://content.usatoday.com/communities/onpolitics/post/2010/09/palin-targets-health-care-law-supporters-on-site/1   palin should put a bullseye on herself!  with any luck it might work!
Cabin Fever goes as far as Arizona?   Tracker (Don)
sad indeed...so much to say on this ..but ill bite my tounge
10 patients 1 dead (young child) 5 in critical 5 in surgery  6 others dead
from just that hospital Randy... other have been sent to other hospitals...the less critical.
I know ... it's just nuts........glad I live in a small town.. not to say that we're exempt from stuff like this but it's less likely to happen.
My God !!! Like i said before, humans are the most unpredictable animals on the planet. My heart goes out to the victims........A Sad day indeed
American`s sure love their guns! My sympathies to the victims and their families.

I hope she pulls through.   This is terribly depressing to me.  Dr Sal.   I saw that before also.  The guy she beat in the elections was making references to automatic weapons and what not as well.  They pander to the gun lobby so they use terms like that to get public approval.  I wouldn't think that anyone would take it seriously enough to kill people. If they did they are nuts anyways and you can't go around worrying about how a loony is going to take what you say.
Just nuts....
I saw it on breaking news while watching family guy, what a tragedy indeed, my symphony to the families of the victims.
Leave the gun lobby alone. Nuts is nuts and this was done by a nut.
Agree
Hear Hear! A gun is a tool that can be used for good or bad, just like a tounge.
i second that.Nutz is as nutz does.

I said nothing of the gun lobby except to explain why Sarah Palin has targets all over her stuff, and why the guy Gabrielle Giffords was running against said something to the effect of "go with a full automatic".  The second half of my post read exactly like this --  I wouldn't think that anyone would take it seriously enough to kill people. If they did they are nuts anyways and you can't go around worrying about how a loony is going to take what you say.   The guy was a nut.  Plain and simple.
I think this is the shooters Youtube channell  http://www.youtube.com/user/Classitup10
Teej... that is the exact thing that was being shown on CNN... the kid is a nut-bar... plain n simple.
thats some scarey crap

Crazy is right, but I'd like to hear the whole story. Not saying it's right, but, a human can get pushed to far, there is a braking point. I've had friends that have lost everything ex.( came home and found wife with his best friend)  Some don't care, but others see red. We just hear one side sometimes. Just saying thats all. Thanks Gerritt, I'll be watching the 11 o'clock news Sad indeed.
I bet his lawyer is going to ask for "currency" up front...sorry ..not a joking matter ...very tastless of me but for some reason i just can NOT press the Delete...B U T T O N !
Possibly another case of Hannity Insanity?
